ChangeDescription: Added new integration for Microsoft Azure Sentinel
Fixed the creation of AlertInfo to allow alerts to be processed properly
Improved connector to better handle Sentinel incidents/alerts in Siemplify
Refactored integration to support Python 3.7
Fix a bug that causes the connector to miss incidents in high volume environments.
Fix a bug that prevents the connector from setting the correct environment when "Environment Field Name" field is set.
Added integration support for the Playbook Simulator feature, allowing you to build, test and edit your workflow logic in a pre-production environment.
New Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incidents Connector v2 added
ItemName: Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2

ChangeDescription: Updated connector logic to track already processed incidents ids (ids.json)
ItemName: Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2

ChangeDescription: Updated connector logic for handling firstAlertTimeGenerated and lastAlertTimeGenerated fields.
Updated connector logic to avoid ingestion of faulty incidents.
Added a mechanism to avoid connector looping when all alerts have the exact same timestamp.
ItemName: Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2

ChangeDescription: Added fallback logic in Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2 for Vendor Field Name, Product Field Name and Event Field Name fields. After the integration and connector upgrade, its recommended to change the value of Product Field Name and Event Field Name to product_type and event_type respectively for this new functionality to work.
ItemName: Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2

ChangeDescription: Enhanced the Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2 logic for handling Start Time and End Time fields, connector will use a pre-defined list of fallback values for Start Time and End Time fields.
ItemName: Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2

ChangeDescription: Updated Microsoft Azure Sentinel Connector v2 backlog management logic.
ItemName: Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2

ChangeDescription: Fallback fields debug parameter added in Azure Sentinel Connector v2.
ItemName: Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2

ChangeDescription: Added OAUTH2 Login Endpoint Url parameter in Azure Sentinel Connectors and Integration.

Regression Note - The changes in this version might cause regressive changes, due to the changes in the following actions: List Incidents, List Alert Rules, Update Incident Details, Update Incident Labels. In short: Status values "Draft" and "InProgress" are no longer accepted by the api. Instead of "InProgress", "Active" status can be used. Severity value "Critical" is no longer accepted by the api. Json results were changed because updated endpoints return different data.
Updated the integration's code to work with Python version 3

List Alert Rules: Due to Azure Sentinel backend changes, Severity value "Critical" is no longer accepted by the api. New action input parameter "Max Rules to Return" is added to limit the number of rules to return.
List Incidents: Action endpoint is updated due to deprecation. This change might cause regressions in existing playbooks.
Update Incident Details: Action endpoint is updated due to deprecation.This change might cause regressions in existing playbooks.

Update Incident Labels: Action endpoint is updated due to deprecation, and logic has changed, to add labels on top of the existing ones, instead of replacing them. This change might cause regressions in existing playbooks.
Get Alert Rule Details: Action's JSON result is updated to ensure compatibility with the Siemplify Expression Builder.

Incidents Connector: Connector's logic is updated to gracefully skip incorrectly formatted Azure Sentinel incidents. To better handle these incidents, we recommended migrating to Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incidents Connector V2.
Incidents Connector V2: Improved functionality and logic of the connector.

Incidents Connector V2: Connector's default values for "Max Incidents per Cycle" and "PythonProcessTimeout" were changed. It's also recommended to increase the run intervals between connector cycles to at least 30 seconds instead of default 10.

Incidents Connector V2: "Max Incidents per Cycle" input parameter was changed to "Max New Incidents Per Cycle", and now controls how many new incidents will the connector request from Azure Sentinel in one connector cycle.
Incidents Connector V2: New parameter "Max Backlog Incidents Per Cycle" was added to control how many backlogged incidents connector will request from Azure Sentinel in one connector cycle.
"Run a KQL Query" action updated to return a Case Wall table based on the query results.
Updated the integration's logo.
Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2 - Updated connector flow to support incidents with labels and owner fields.
Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2 - Updated pagination handling logic when fetching the Azure Sentinel Incidents.
Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2 - Updated the logic for handling alert entities if Azure Sentinel incident has only one alert.
Updated handling of Azure Sentinel Scheduled Alerts.
Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2 - Improved connector backlog logic.

Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2 - Important Note: Added a new parameter to limit the number of events ingested for Azure Sentinel's Scheduled Alerts. Default limit is 100. When updating, please make sure this number matches your needs, or change it accordingly. Please refer to our documentation for more information.
Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2 - Enhanced connector logic to handle issues when getting entities data from the Microsoft Azure Sentinel.

Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector - Updated connector to better support Siemplify's SAAS deployment. Important - Before updating, please make sure to read our white paper for stateless connectors here: https://integrations.siemplify.co/doc/stateless-connectors-white-paper.

Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2 - Updated connector to better support Siemplify's SAAS deployment. Important - Before updating, please make sure to read our white paper for stateless connectors here: https://integrations.siemplify.co/doc/stateless-connectors-white-paper.
ItemName: Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2
